To reset your password, click on login assistance on the Supplier Portal new page will open, enter your username and click on forgot password. Check your email for a reset link, click on the link and fill in the username and the new password you would like to use.

patterns: No link in email to reset a password
responses: If you've not received a reset password link in your email after resetting your password via Login Assistance, First check your spam folder if the mail is there, if not call our Call center on 0800221416 / 0204801801 for further assistance.

patterns: want to register as a supplier
responses: To register as a supplier, visit the Supplier Portal click on supplier self registration, enter the company registration number and valid KRA pin linked to company and validate the details. If successful the company will be displayed at the top of the page, proceed to fill contact details and click next to categorise your company and submit. Check your email within an hour for a temporary password to login. From there you can see your IFMIS number at the top right corner of the page after logging in.
To register as a supplier, click on the link below to watch a video on the same Supplier Registration
To respond to an RFQ (Request For Quotation) check out this video on Youtube: Request For Quotation

Responding to RFQ (Request For Quotation) utilizes the sourcing supplier responsibility, Click on the responsibility and click on sourcing homepage to open the page. Go to open negotiations to find your open negotiations.....

patterns: getting an error when I validate company details
responses: If you get an error during validation of the company registration number and the KRA pin, counter-check your pin to see if you've made any typing error. If the pin is correct and you're trying to register a business name, visit KRA offices for them to link your personal pin with the company pin.

If you get a validation error during registration of a company, counter check the entered values and ensure they are ok, confirm if the pin is VAT registered, or if its linked with the company registration number using the KRA pin checker service.

To create an ADN (Advance Delivery Notice) Click on the New Kenya I supplier Portal Full Access, click on deliveries and click on create Advance Delivery Notice, Select the PO Number of the delivery you would like to create, and click on Add to Deliveries, enter the delivery number and expected delivery date and then submit.
To create an ADN (Advance Delivery Notice) you can check out our video on Youtube: Advance Delivery Notice on how to create the Delivery Notice.

To create an Invoice, click on the New Kenya I supplier portal full access, click on Finance, then Click on create Invoices, create invoice with a PO, Enter the PO Number you would like to create an invoice for and click on Go. The PO will populate, select it and add to invoice, click on next to enter your invoice number and attach the scanned invoice, tip: Confirm your Bank Details and the Pin at this Stage.Click continue until you submit the Invoice.
To create an invoice watch the following video: Invoice Creation/Submission the video guides you on how to create an invoice in the IFMIS supplier portal.

patterns: i get an error when I submit an invoice
responses: Invoice error, for a no bank details error, or no KRA pin error, Get in touch with the entity you traded with for them to attach. Note:  Attachment of Bank Details happens at the Entity Level and not at the IFMIS Department Headquarters

To change an email send an email to info@ifmis.go.ke with a Scanned letter stating the change of email from the current one to a new email, state the IFMIS Number and the name of the company,plus attach the KRA PIN Certificate, Registration Certificate and the ID copy of the person signing that letter. Expect reply within 3 days.
For VPN Password reset, send an email to info@ifmis.go.ke, indicate the username and the entity you're working with.
For VPN account creation, send an email to info@ifmis.go.ke, include your full names, personal number, department or the entity you work with.

If you forgot your username,On the supplier portal homepage, click on login assistance and under the Forgot UserName section, enter your email address and click on forgot username to receive a username. Check your email address for an email from Workflow Mailer.
The Kenya Supplier Portal can be accessed at Supplier Portal
The IFMIS Number is a Unique Identifier that a Supplier is given when they register in IFMIS

patterns: requirements for getting an IFMIS number
What is needed to register as a supplier
requirements for registration as a supplier in IFMIS
what i need to register as a supplier
responses: For successful registration at the IFMIS Supplier Portal you require the following a) For Limited Company: KRA Tax PIN and Company Registration Number. b) Sole Proprietors: Individual Tax PIN and Business Name Registration Number. c) GOK Consultant: Individual Tax PIN and National ID.

patterns: have not received an email after registration
rno response after registering as a supplier
responses: It very important that a user register with the correct email address. The reasons for not getting email a) The email address was wrongly typed. b) The user forgot the email used to register. c) The email is going to the spam folder. If the user domain is rejecting the mail from the ifmis.go.ke You can contact IFMIS department through sending an email info@ifmis.go.ke or call 0204801801 for assistance.

Integrated Financial Management Information System (IFMIS) is an automated system that enhances efficiency in Planning, Budgeting, Procurement, Expenditure Management and Reporting in the National and County Governments in Kenya. IFMIS is operational in both the National and County Governments. The system guarantees that each expense is traceable, delivering optimal value to every Taxpayer. 
 VISION: An excelently secure, reliable, efficient, effective, and fully integrated financial management. 
 MISSION: To Passionately and with commitment continuosly enhance our capture our capacities to innovate and leverage on the best technology to provide for a fully integrated financial management
